forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
